Detailed Description

Multiple producers declaration.

This exception is thrown by Factory when trying to declare multiple producers with the same associated ID.

Note:
As most of the declaration are done using static global variables. This exception is generally thrown outside of the main function scope. I do not know how it would impact the execution of the program in different platforms.
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org> TREX::utils::Factory
